title: The Austrian Tyrol
brief_description: Famed for its natural beauty and alpine grandeur, the Austrian Tyrol has excellent mountain roads for enjoyable walks or mountain climbing. The film shows some of the villages including the 700 years old city of Innsbruck nestling below the vast mountains.
